body.p: Your need to convert to a DITA task a given content which may be encoded in DITA format, XML, plain text, or Markdown.
If the content contains information about multiple tasks then generate multiple task topics, the additional tasks may be placed immediately after the <taskbody> of the main task.
Your response should follow the template:
body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE task PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DITA General Task//EN" "generalTask.dtd"> <task id="[generate an ID]"> ... </task>
